plot: The citizens of a tiny Cornish village are tormented during World War II by a headless ghost which is haunting the local tin mine.
title: The Mysterious Doctor
plot_es: The citizens of a tiny Cornish village are tormented during World War II by a headless ghost which is haunting the local tin mine.
plot_en: The citizens of a tiny Cornish village are tormented during World War II by a headless ghost which is haunting the local tin mine.
